Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_00>Then on my hunt, Death Mountain blew
its top. It was covered in lava before you
could say boom.
Boy, I'd forgotten all about my search for
the lakes...

<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_00>That's it. Talkin' about this has me all
worked up. It's been a real long time,
but I'm ready to start the hunt again!
<sp:3:0:2:0001>Best place to start lookin' is <clr:0000>halfway up
Death Mountain<clr:ffff>. My hunch way back
when led me to the <clr:0000>north side<clr:ffff>.
There's a YunoboCo dig site there
too, so we can hop in a mine cart and
get crackin'.
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_01>I still recall an old nursery rhyme about
the Lizard Lakes.

"One brother hunts what the other
brother hides—two lizards fighting
over what's inside."
Not everyone knows this, but the <clr:0000>Lizard
Lakes <clr:ffff>are also called the <clr:0000>Lizard Brothers<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I searched high and low for 'em back in
my younger years. Always thought
<clr:0000>treasure <clr:ffff>must be<clr:0000> <clr:ffff>there somewhere.
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal_01>You tellin' me you're gonna go lookin'? If
you're serious, you'll want to head about
<clr:0000>halfway up Death Mountain<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>I'm pretty sure it was the <clr:0000>north side<clr:ffff>...


<sp:3:0:2:0001>There's a YunoboCo dig site there
too, so you can hop in a mine cart
and get crackin'.
Talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_00>Even if I can't do much, I'll search this
area some more to get us answers about
Princess Zelda.
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Bit surprised to hear the words "<clr:0000>Lizard
Lakes<clr:ffff>" comin' outta your craw. Don't
much hear about them lakes these days.
I still recall an old nursery rhyme
about 'em.

"One brother hunts what the other
brother hides—two lizards fighting
over what's inside."
Not everyone knows this, but the <clr:0000>Lizard
Lakes <clr:ffff>are also called the <clr:0000>Lizard Brothers<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I searched high and low for them back in
my younger years. Always thought
<clr:0000>treasure <clr:ffff>must be<clr:0000> <clr:ffff>there somewhere.
Talk_05: <sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_01>If it weren't for my achin' back, I'd join ya.
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>If only my back weren't hurting so much...


What I'd give to go lookin' for the
Lizard Brothers treasure once more...
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Ease_01>The Lizard Lakes don't seem like a
dangerous place.

Maybe I misunderstood when I was told
not to go near them.
Talk_07:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Runaway_00>What's all this then?!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:2:2:6400>


<sp:0:2:2:7d00>You found the Lizard Brothers?!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM_00>Equipment named after a Divine Beast?!<sp:5:0:0>
Is that what you're decked out in?

<sp:3:0:2:0801>What a red-hot piece of treasure!
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:TalkPositive_01>Since the lava cooled, I always wondered
if someone might find 'em.

Not only did you do it, you found treasure
to boot!<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_01>You're Yunobo's partner, all right!


Wish I could go back in time and tell my
spry younger self that the Lizard Brothers
really do exist!
I feel a real sense of fulfillment hearing
this. <sp:5:0:0>Thanks for sharing the good news.
Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0400>And you're wearing the treasure you
found there?!
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM_00>Equipment named after a Divine Beast?<sp:5:0:0>


What a red-hot treasure!
Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Have you talked to Yunobo recently?<sp:5:0:0>


I was surprised to hear "<clr:0000>Lizard Lakes<clr:ffff>"
comin' outta his craw. Don't much hear
about them lakes these days.
I still recall an old nursery rhyme
about 'em.

"One brother hunts what the other
brother hides—two lizards fighting
over what's inside."
Not everyone knows this, but the <clr:0000>Lizard
Lakes <clr:ffff>are also called the <clr:0000>Lizard Brothers<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I searched high and low for them back in
my younger years. Always thought
<clr:0000>treasure <clr:ffff>must be<clr:0000> <clr:ffff>there somewhere.
